text.text: Learners think that English is a difficult language. Let us understand some of the common reasons as to why they think so, as English is different from other languages across the globe.

text: Words with the same spelling can have different pronunciations in English
English uses a lot of Idioms, that are not meant to be taken literally
English has different dialects like American English, British English, and Australian English
Vocabulary can also differ from region to region so finding the right words can be challenging

text.text: Despite these challenges, there’s always value in learning new languages, especially those like English which you will use commonly, socially, in college or at work. That is why it’s a good idea to get some extra help when using English.
So, if you’re keen to be a great communicator in English, consider these Smart Tips to make it easy for you.
If you add the following ideas to your day-to-day language learning, you will see some marked improvement.

text: Don’t worry too much about Making Mistakes
Don’t follow written English Style / don’t learn by heart
Watch Television, films, and relevant  social media
